pageContent:
What can you help me with?
I can help you with any question related to the app! Ask me something below ðŸ‘‡

metadata.question: What can you help me with?

pageContent:
How do I create an account?
Click the login button on the top-right, then choose 'Create New Account' from the popup modal and fill in your email,name and password.

metadata.question: How do I create an account?

pageContent:
I can't login
Click the login button at the top-right and enter your credentials. If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot Password' to reset it.

metadata.question: I can't login

pageContent:
How do I reset my password?
Click the login button, then click â€˜Forgot Password?â€™ in the login modal to receive a reset link via email.

metadata.question: How do I reset my password?

pageContent:
How to edit my profile?
Click on your profile picture in the top-right and select 'Edit Profile' to update your details.

metadata.question: How to edit my profile?

pageContent:
Do you deliver on Sundays?
Yes! We deliver every day, including Sundays, between 8 AM and 10 PM.

metadata.question: Do you deliver on Sundays?

pageContent:
When do you deliver?
Our delivery hours are from 8 AM to 10 PM daily, including weekends.

metadata.question: When do you deliver?

pageContent:
What areas do you deliver to?
We deliver to all major cities and towns in texas.

metadata.question: What areas do you deliver to?

pageContent:
Where can I add my address?
You can add your delivery address during checkout or directly at: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/add-address

metadata.question: Where can I add my address?

pageContent:
Can I change my address?
Yes! You can change your address during checkout or at https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/add-address

metadata.question: Can I change my address?

pageContent:
How can I pay?
We support secure online payments via Stripe and cash on delivery (COD).

metadata.question: How can I pay?

pageContent:
Is online payment secure?
Absolutely. We use Stripe for secure transactions and do not store your payment details.

metadata.question: Is online payment secure?

pageContent:
How do I return an item?
Packaged items can be returned within 30 days. Please contact support with your order number to start the process.

metadata.question: How do I return an item?

pageContent:
What items can I return?
You can return unused packaged items in their original packaging within 30 days of delivery.

metadata.question: What items can I return?

pageContent:
Can I return fresh fruits or vegetables?
No, fresh produce like fruits and vegetables cannot be returned due to their perishable nature.

metadata.question: Can I return fresh fruits or vegetables?

pageContent:
Can I cancel my order?
Cancelling orders isn't available via app. Please contact support at support@zestygroceries.com for help.

metadata.question: Can I cancel my order?

pageContent:
How do I get a refund?
Once we receive your returned item, your refund will be processed within 5â€“7 business days.

metadata.question: How do I get a refund?

pageContent:
How can I subscribe to offers?
Scroll to the bottom of our homepage and fill out the newsletter form: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app. Youâ€™ll get updates and deals in your inbox!

metadata.question: How can I subscribe to offers?

pageContent:
How do I unsubscribe from newsletter?
Click the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any email you received from us.

metadata.question: How do I unsubscribe from newsletter?

pageContent:
How do I contact support?
You can email us at support@zestygroceries.com or call +1 (234) 567-8901 (Monâ€“Sat, 9 AMâ€“8 PM).

metadata.question: How do I contact support?

pageContent:
Is customer service available on weekends?
Customer service is available Monday to Saturday from 9 AM to 8 PM. Sunday is closed.

metadata.question: Is customer service available on weekends?

pageContent:
Where can I find top discounts?
Visit the 'Top Discounts' section on the homepage or go to: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/#topDiscounts

metadata.question: Where can I find top discounts?

pageContent:
Where are best sellers shown?
Youâ€™ll find them in the 'Best Sellers' section of the homepage or visit: https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/#bestsellers

metadata.question: Where are best sellers shown?

pageContent:
What categories do you have?
We offer Organic Veggies, Fresh Fruits, Drinks, Instant Foods, Dairy, Bakery, and Grains & Cereals. See all at https://zesty-beta.vercel.app/products

metadata.question: What categories do you have?

pageContent:
What is Zesty known for?
Weâ€™re known for lightning-fast delivery, unbeatable freshness, and affordable prices. Trusted by over 10,000 happy customers!

metadata.question: What is Zesty known for?

pageContent:
What makes Zesty different?
Zesty offers 30-minute delivery, farm-fresh products, great prices, and a user-friendly shopping experience.

metadata.question: What makes Zesty different?
